Package com4j

com4j Java <->COM interop library.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CLSCTX CLSCTX constants.
Com4jObject Root of all the com4j interfaces.
ComEnum When enums need uncontinuous values, implement this interface and have each constant return its numeric value.
ComObjectListener Callback that receives a notification whenever a new wrapper object is created.
EventCookie Represents a subscription to COM events.
IDispatch  
 

Class Summary
ActiveXControl Canvas that hosts an OLE control (AKA ActiveX control.)
COM4J The root of the COM4J library.
DefaultedComMethod ComMethod that calls default methods.
Dispatch<T>  
ErrorInfo Represents error information.
GUID Immutable representation of 128-bit COM GUID.
Holder<T> Data holder used for "out" or "in/out" parameter.
SafeArray TODO: General purpose wrapper for COM SAFEARRAY.
SafeArray.Bound Bound of an array index.
Variant Wraps COM VARIANT data structure.
Wrapper InvocationHandler that backs up a COM object.
 

Enum Summary
NativeType Native method type.
Variant.Type VARIANT type.
 

Exception Summary
ComException Signals a failure in the COM method invocation.
ExecutionException Signals a general RuntimeException thrown during com4j processing.
IllegalAnnotationException Signals incorrect use of com4j annotations.
 

Annotation Types Summary
DefaultMethod Marks a "default property" method.
DISPID Dispatch ID of the method.
IID Annotates a COM interface by its IID.
MarshalAs Controls how a Java parameter should be marshalled to a native type.
PropGet Used with DISPID to indicate that the Java method is a property get operation.
PropPut Used with DISPID to indicate that the Java method is a property put operation.
ReturnValue Specifies which method parameter in the COM method is used as the return value
VTID Virtual table index of the method.
 

Package com4j Description

com4j Java <->COM interop library.
